Class Suicidal

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceInvaders.Objects.SpaceObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Movable

    public class Suicidal
extends Enemy
    Suicidal extends Enemy class. Represents suicidal type of enemies.
    Author:
    Jose Miguel Melo & Ricardo Loureiro
